TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PasswordBox extends System.Windows.Controls.Control
Public NotInheritable Class PasswordBox Inherits Control
public ref class PasswordBox sealed : System::Windows::Controls::Control

summary.span: 表示設計用來輸入與處理密碼的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control designed for entering and handling passwords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 有內建的反昇處理和事件。 has built-in handling for the bubbling and events. 因此，自訂事件處理常式，接聽`MouseUp`或`MouseDown`事件從`PasswordBox`永遠不會呼叫。Consequently, custom event handlers that listen for `MouseUp` or `MouseDown` events from a `PasswordBox` will never be called. 如果您需要回應這些事件，接聽通道和事件相反地，或註冊處理常式取代（這個第二種選項是僅可透過程式碼） 的引數。If you need to respond to these events, listen for the tunneling and events instead, or register the handlers with the argument (this latter option is only available through code). 不會將事件處理，除非您要刻意停用標記原生處理這些事件，並注意這會明顯影響控制項的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。Do not mark the event handled unless you deliberately want to disable native handling of these events, and be aware that this has notable effects on the control's [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. ## 自訂 PasswordBox 控制項Customizing the PasswordBox Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[PasswordBox Syles 和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/passwordbox-syles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [PasswordBox Syles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/passwordbox-syles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在按鈕控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定的處理常式方法事件。The following example shows how to specify the handler method for the event. [!code-xaml[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChangedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_pwbox_pwchangedxaml)] 下列範例會顯示對應的事件處理常式。The following example shows the corresponding event handler. 在此情況下，事件處理常式只會遞增計數器。In this case, the event handler simply increments a counter. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChanged](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwbox_pwchanged)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChanged](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwbox_pwchanged)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ CaretBrush { System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Brush ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定筆刷，這個筆刷指定密碼方塊的插入號色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the brush that specifies the color of the password box's caret.

value.span: 筆刷，描述密碼方塊的插入號色彩。

span.span: A brush that describes the color of the password box's caret.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以設定屬性來指定其插入號的色彩。You can set the property of a to specify the color of its caret. 例如，您可以設定是相同的值屬性。For example, you can set to be the same value as the property. 表示的色彩字串中字元。 indicates the color of the characters in the . ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定和為紅色。The following example creates a and sets the and to red. [!code-xaml[TextBaseSelectionBrush#PasswordBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/textbaseselectionbrush/CS/window1.xaml#passwordbox)] 上述範例會產生類似下圖的輸出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![Caretbrush 設定為紅色的 PasswordBox。] (~/add/media/passwordboxcaretbrush.png "PasswordBox caretbrush 設定為紅色。")![PasswordBox with CaretBrush set to red.](~/add/media/passwordboxcaretbrush.png "PasswordBox with CaretBrush set to red.") Caretbrush 設定為紅色的 PasswordBoxPasswordBox with CaretBrush set to red

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要由這個 處理的密碼最大長度。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum length for passwords to be handled by this .

value.span: 指定要由這個 處理之密碼最大長度的整數 (以字元為單位)。

span.span: An integer specifying the maximum length, in characters, for passwords to be handled by this .

value.span: 值為零 (**0**) 表示沒有限制。

span.span: A value of zero (**0**) means no limit.

value.span: 預設值是**0** （沒有長度限制）。

span.span: The default value is **0** (no length limit).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性只會限制使用者; 手動輸入的密碼它沒有任何作用，以程式設計方式操作上的屬性。This property only restricts passwords entered manually by the user; it has no effect on programmatic manipulation of the property. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChangedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_pwbox_pwchangedxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_MaxLen](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwdbox_maxlen)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_MaxLen](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwdbox_maxlen)]

public: property System::String ^ Password { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目前由 保留的密碼。

span.span: Gets or sets the password currently held by the .

value.span: 表示目前由 保留的密碼字串。

span.span: A string representing the password currently held by the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您取得屬性值，您可以公開密碼以純文字格式在記憶體中。When you get the property value, you expose the password as plain text in memory. 若要避免此潛在的安全性風險，請使用屬性以取得做為密碼。To avoid this potential security risk, use the property to get the password as a . 此屬性設定為`null`設為基礎的密碼會導致。Setting this property to `null` causes the underlying password to be set to . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_Pwd](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwdbox_pwd)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_Pwd](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwdbox_pwd)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property char PasswordChar { char get(); void set(char value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 的遮罩字元。

span.span: Gets or sets the masking character for the .

value.span: 當使用者輸入文字至 時，會以遮罩字元回應。

span.span: A masking character to echo when the user enters text into the .

value.span: 預設值是項目符號字元 (**●**)。

span.span: The default value is a bullet character (**●**).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字輸入時，這個屬性所指定的遮罩字元會在回應中的密碼輸入的欄位，而不是實際密碼本身。When text is entered into a , the masking character specified by this property is echoed in the password input field, rather than the actual password itself. 這有助於防止使用者輸入時公開給不會隨便被觀察者密碼。This helps prevent passwords from being exposed to casual observers when they are entered. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性項目。The following example shows how to set the attribute of a element. [!code-xaml[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwBox_PwChangedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_pwbox_pwchangedxaml)] 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以程式設計的方式。The following example shows how to set the property programmatically. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_PwdChar](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwdbox_pwdchar)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_PwdChar](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwdbox_pwdchar)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Paste() cil managed

summary.span: 以 [剪貼簿] 的內容取代 中目前的選取範圍。

span.span: Replaces the current selection in the with the contents of the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不會清除的內容之前貼上，將會以貼上的內容取代目前選取範圍，或在目前游標位置插入貼上的內容。This method does not clear the contents of the before the paste; it will either replace the current selection with pasted content, or insert the pasted content at the current cursor position. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何貼上內容與方法。The following example shows how to paste content into a with the method. [!code-csharp[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_Paste](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_pwdbox_paste)] [!code-vb[PasswordBoxSnippets#_PwdBox_Paste](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PasswordBoxSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_pwdbox_paste)]

span.span: Gets or sets the brush that highlights selected text.

value.span: 會反白顯示所選取文字的筆刷。

span.span: A brush that highlights selected text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定會藉由設定反白顯示所選取的文字的筆刷和屬性。You can specify the brush that highlights selected text by setting the and properties. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定綠色的屬性和屬性為 0.5。The following example creates a and sets the property to green and the property to 0.5. [!code-xaml[TextBaseSelectionBrush#PasswordBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/textbaseselectionbrush/CS/window1.xaml#passwordbox)] 上述範例會產生類似下圖的輸出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![Selectionbrush 設定為綠色的 PasswordBox。] (~/add/media/passwordboxselectionbrush.png "PasswordBox selectionbrush 設定為綠色。")![PasswordBox with SelectionBrush set to green.](~/add/media/passwordboxselectionbrush.png "PasswordBox with SelectionBrush set to green.") summary.span: 取得或設定 的不透明度。

span.span: Gets or sets the opacity of the .
The opacity of the .
The default is 0.4.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定為 0，透明，看不到。If you set the to 0, the is transparent and is not visible. 如果您設定為 1.0 或更高，是不透明，而且所選取文字不可見。If you set the to 1.0 or greater, the is opaque and the selected text is not visible. ## Examples 下列範例會建立並設定綠色的屬性和屬性為 0.5。The following example creates a and sets the property to green and the property to 0.5. [!code-xaml[TextBaseSelectionBrush#PasswordBox](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/textbaseselectionbrush/CS/window1.xaml#passwordbox)] 上述範例會產生類似下圖的輸出。The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration. ![Selectionbrush 設定為綠色的 PasswordBox。] (~/add/media/passwordboxselectionbrush.png "PasswordBox selectionbrush 設定為綠色。")![PasswordBox with SelectionBrush set to green.](~/add/media/passwordboxselectionbrush.png "PasswordBox with SelectionBrush set to green.") 具有設定為 0.5 SelectionOpacity PasswordBox 中選取的文字Selected text in a PasswordBox with SelectionOpacity set to 0.5
